def.dt: :a business that provides a particular service an insurance/travel/employment agency a prominent ad agency
:a government department that is responsible for a particular activity, area, etc. federal law enforcement agencies the federal agency in charge of printing money various government agencies
:by using the help or services of (something or someone) The treaty was ratified through the agency of a neutral country.
:a company whose business is to find jobs for people He found work as a mechanic through an employment agency.
:an organization that collects and gives news to newspapers, magazines, television news programs, and radio stations called also press agency
:a business that helps to make arrangements for people who want to travel
:a person who is able to act freely without being controlled by someone else
:a professional athlete (such as a baseball player) who is free to sign a contract to play for any team

utxt.vi: an athlete who has become eligible for free agency
